hero.subtitle: Building production-grade applications with rigorous testing, zero-tolerance engineering practices, and intelligent automation.

featuredProject.title: ArbitrageVault BookFinder
featuredProject.description: Full-stack application with automated product discovery, pricing analysis, and opportunity scoring for book arbitrage. Built with FastAPI, React, and PostgreSQL.

methodology.sectionSubtitle: A systematic approach combining AI orchestration with rigorous engineering practices.

highlights.title: Zero-Tolerance Engineering
highlights.description: Mandatory checkpoints, hostile code review, and verification gates before any completion claim.

highlights.title: MCP Server Integration
highlights.description: GitHub, Render, Netlify, Neon, Context7 - automated DevOps through Model Context Protocol.

highlights.title: Superpowers Workflow
highlights.description: Systematic debugging, TDD, verification-before-completion - skills that enforce rigor.
